types.html:
zoréol m (plural zoréols, feminine zoréole)

  1. a person of mixed French and Creole parentage (in Réunion)
  2. a person from mainland France who has lived in Réunion a long time and has adapted to the local way of life
trans: a person of mixed French and Creole parentage
a person from mainland France who has lived in Réunion a long time and has adapted to the local way of life
